mapper.select: SELECT es.id as score_id, st.id as score_type_id, st.name as score_type_name, st.description as description, es.raw_score as raw_score, es.normalized_score as normalized_score FROM estate_score es JOIN score_type st ON es.score_type_id = st.id WHERE es.estate_id = #{estateId} ORDER BY es.normalized_score DESC
SELECT id, name, description, active FROM score_type WHERE active = true ORDER BY id
